page.title: 10SANDAY SCHOOL
page.content: The present school building is situated in the{centre of the island and was built in{1964.}It replaced and combined the four separate schools existing on the island. The school is for both{Secondary and Primary {pupils}of which there are{83.}There are{3 Primary classrooms.}Classes 1 and 2 in Room 1; classes 3,4 and 5 in Room 2; and classes 6 and 7 in Room 3. The Secondary department includes a {Technical}Room; combined{Arts/Crafts and{Home Economics}Room; combined {Science/Maths}Room; combined {English/History/Geography}Room and a {French}Room. There are{3 Primary {teachers}and{2 Full-time Secondary {teachers. Visiting teachers}come from the Mainland by{plane.}The pupils are conveyed by{school mini-bus}to and from the school. Most pupils live within 4 kilometres of the school.
